title: RADS error, Repair Failed error
body:
Last night support person fell asleep trying to help me to solve it. Following are some things we tried.

Tried google dns, firewall disable, all things run as admin.
Alternate_Installer.zip
Disable IPv6 and switch to IPv4: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/929852
netsh interface teredo set state disabled
Perform a clean boot: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/929135

Currently: HextechRepariTool  crashes if i try to gather system logs or force repatch, other options work. Trying to start client gives repair failed and lauchers give rads errors.

replies.body: The RADS error is pretty common when OS or antivirus settings are blocking game files from being accessed.  The steps you've tried are not bad, but they focus more on connection problems.  Instead, try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is allowed to access necessary files.  This may also restore access to getting HRT up.  Let me know if that helps!
